title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. XXII, subch. A, pt. 2406 - Special Administrative Relief Provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. XXII, subch. A, pt. 2406 - Special Administrative Relief Provisions

State Regulations
§ 2406.1 - Eligibility for further financial aid after default

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. XXII, subch. A, pt. 2406

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 655[4], 661[4]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
